pages.text: Souls are special items obtained from killing mobs with a $(l:archon:necromancy/soul_scythe)Soul Scythe$() or with an item enchanted with $(l:archon:effects_enchants/reaping)Reaping$().

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: These souls are used with a $(l:archon:necromancy/undead_staff)Staff of Undead$() to obtain Soul Power. When you have a Staff of Undead in your inventory, it will automatically consume picked up souls.
